ygData.subject: Re: DrillBit
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry for lack of detail, the bell rang and I GTG. ... Killfest nods. A bot into their base? Hmm... He steps to one side. Scyther, make yourself a Maximal.

Sorry for lack of detail, the bell rang and I GTG.


::Killfest/Scyther::

Killfest nods. "A bot into their base? Hmm..."

He steps to one side. "Scyther, make yourself a Maximal."

Scyther steps forward and mutters an activation code. His robot mode 
shifts around. Several seconds later a completely new bot stands in 
Scyther's place, with blue optics and the build of a Maximal.

"There's your bot. You want him to take off now?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She looked up at Killfest. "no, we haven't been able to pit them 
> against eacher as you are talking about. In battle though, I have 
> seen with my own eyes, the Allience shoot on us with the maximals at 
> their side. They fight together. For the longest time, the predacons 
> have been fighting amonst themselves and not getting together. Now 
> that I have started to form a council made up of the predacon groups, 
> we are finally getting things to that we can try to get then to see 
> each other as enimies, not allies. But I need someone to go into the 
> Maximal camp, and get the ball rolling as it were."
